title: Anabella Coble and the New Age
description: Thirteen year old Anabella Coble is in a state of mourning and grief. Her faith in almost everything has been shaken since the death of her father. Even though she did not get to say goodbye to him, she has now discovered that she is closer to him then she had ever been before. A secret package and visits from strangers reveal that her father was more important then she could have ever imagined. Because of his past she will have a chance to change her future and the future of others in her world and the Realm.
author: Gavin Oneal
